artist: Engraver: A.B. Duhamel; Artist: after Jean-Florentine Defraine; Author: Jean-Antoine Lebrun-Tossa; Publisher: François Buisson
catalogue_raissonne:
Colas 1936
Cabinet des Modes
Le Brun
creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund, 1966
description: Fashion periodical with a trifold hand-colored engraving of two women on the left shown from the waist up in elaborate hats; a man in the center in yellow breeches, a light blue coat, dark gray boots that cover the knees, a dark gray muff with an orange bow, and a gray hat; on the right a woman in a light purple gown with purple stripes, a light gray muff with an orange bow, and a purple hat
portfolio: From Magasin des Modes nouvelles, françaises et anglaises, Paris, 1786-89
title: Magasin des Modes Nouvelles, Quatrième Année, Huitième Cahier, 11 Février 1789
